alert.note: Alert for Bosque; Erath; Somervell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 02 at 6:18PM CDT until April 02 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN SOMERVELL...EAST CENTRAL ERATH AND BOSQUE COUNTIES... At 618 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Iredell, or 23 miles southeast of Stephenville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clifton, Meridian, Laguna Park, Iredell, Meridian State Park, Lake Whitney, Walnut Springs, Morgan, Cedar Shores, Lakewood Harbor, Norse, Cayote, Kopperl, Duffau, Womack, Chalk Mountain, Lakeside Village and Mosheim. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central and north central Texas.
